publicationVenue.name: International Conference on Language, Data, and Knowledge

title: Profiling Linguistic Knowledge Graphs
abstract: Recently the number of approaches that model and interconnect linguistic data as knowledge graphs has experienced out-standing growth. However, despite the increasing availability of applications that manage such data, little attention has been given to their structural features. In this paper, we propose specific metrics to describe the structural features of knowledge graphs. Such metrics are evaluated on linguistic data and our findings provide a ba-sis for a more efficient understanding of linguistic data.
venue: International Conference on Language, Data, and Knowledge
